00047 class CFile : public CFileDataIO
00048 {
00049 public:
00051     enum { fd_invalid = -1, fd_stdin, fd_stdout, fd_stderr };
00052 
00054     enum OpenMode { read, write, read_write, write_append, write_excl, write_safe };
00055 
00056     
00060     CFile();
00061     
00068     CFile(const CPath& path, OpenMode mode = read);
00069     CFile(const wxString& path, OpenMode mode = read);

00075 
00076

00097     bool Open(const wxString& path, OpenMode mode = read, int accessMode = wxS_DEFAULT);
00098 
00107     void Reopen(OpenMode mode);
00108     
00117     bool Create(const CPath& path, bool overwrite = false, int accessMode = wxS_DEFAULT);
00118     bool Create(const wxString& path, bool overwrite = false, int accessMode = wxS_DEFAULT);
00119     
00126     bool Close();
00127 
00128

00136

00145

00158

00166

00172

00178     
00179 
00183     bool IsOpened() const;
00184     
00185 protected:
00187     virtual sint64 doRead(void* buffer, size_t count) const;
00189     virtual sint64 doWrite(const void* buffer, size_t count);
00191     virtual sint64 doSeek(sint64 offset) const;
00192
